movie.title: Time Loop
movie.description_intro: A young Londoner scientist, running experiments with his father in a quiet Italian village, has to face consequences for choices he hasn't made yet.
movie.description_full: A young Londoner scientist, running experiments with his father in a quiet Italian village, has to face consequences for choices he hasn't made yet.

movies.title: Twinkle Twinkle Lucky Stars
movies.summary: A police informant sent a letter containing sensitive information on an illegal drug operation to his friend, Yi-Ching. While on vacation in Thailand, the informant is assassinated by the drug lord's henchmen and, to cover-up their operation, they attempt to eliminate Yi-Ching and double-agent Lau. Back in Hong Kong, police detectives Muscles and Ricky Fung are assigned to protect Lau and Inspector Barbara Woo is assigned to protect Yi-Ching. She takes her to the hideout of the "Five Lucky Stars" and also enlists their help in bringing down the drug operation.
movies.description_full: A police informant sent a letter containing sensitive information on an illegal drug operation to his friend, Yi-Ching. Back in Hong Kong, police detectives Muscles and Ricky Fung are assigned to protect Lau and Inspector Barbara Woo is assigned to protect Yi-Ching. She takes her to the hideout of the "Five Lucky Stars" and also enlists their help in bringing down the drug operation.

movies.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
movies.title_english: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
movies.title_long: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai (1999)
movies.summary: A hitman who lives by the code of the samurai, works for the mafia and finds himself in their crosshairs when his recent job doesn't go according to plan. Now he must find a way to defend himself and his honor while retaining the code he lives by.
movies.description_full: A hitman who lives by the code of the samurai, works for the mafia and finds himself in their crosshairs when his recent job doesn't go according to plan. Now he must find a way to defend himself and his honor while retaining the code he lives by.
movies.synopsis: A hitman who lives by the code of the samurai, works for the mafia and finds himself in their crosshairs when his recent job doesn't go according to plan. Now he must find a way to defend himself and his honor while retaining the code he lives by.

movies.title: If the Shoe Fits
movies.summary: A modern Cinderella in Paris: While the plain Kelly Carter jobs as a gadrobiere for the famous fashion designer Francesco, she dreams of designing shoes for him. However she can't win his attention... until she meets a good fairy on the street, who enchants a pair of Kelly's shoes, so that she turns into supermodel Prudence whenever she wears them. She attends one of Francesco's balls and immediately wins his heart. Now, how can she make him love her real self?

movies.title: The Assault
movies.summary: A woman and her best friend go on a crime spree to rob her husband and escape her marriage.
movies.description_full: A woman and her best friend go on a crime spree to rob her husband and escape her marriage.
